SEARCH
Package game.conditions

Class HealthCondition

java.lang.Object
game.conditions.HealthCondition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Condition
public class HealthCondition extends Object implements Condition
A condition that checks whether an Actor's health is above or below a specified threshold. This condition can be used to control dialogue, behaviors, or events that depend on the actor's current health.
Author:
Adji Ilhamhafiz Sarie Hakim

  • Constructor Details

    • HealthCondition

      public HealthCondition(int health, boolean higher)
      Constructs a HealthCondition with a specific health threshold and comparison direction.
      Parameters:
      health - the health threshold to compare against
      higher - true if condition should check for health greater than the threshold, false if it should check for health less than the threshold

  • Method Details

    • isSatisfied

      public boolean isSatisfied(Actor actor, Location location)
      Evaluates whether the actor's health satisfies the condition.
      Specified by:
      isSatisfied in interface Condition
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor to evaluate
      location - the location of the actor (not used in this condition)
      Returns:
      true if the actor's health meets the specified condition, false otherwise
